item.title: Announcing OpenAI Data Partnerships — help steer the future of AI by collaborating on public and private datasets with us. https://openai.com/blog/data-partnerships
item.content:encoded: Announcing OpenAI Data Partnerships — help steer the future of AI by collaborating on public and private datasets with us. openai.com/blog/data-partner…

item.title:
We're rolling out new features and improvements that developers have been asking for:
1. Our new model GPT-4 Turbo supports 128K context and has fresher knowledge than GPT-4. Its input and output tokens are respectively 3× and 2× less expensive than GPT-4. It’s available now to all developers in preview.
2. Assistants API and new tools (Retrieval, Code Interpreter) will help developers build world-class AI assistants within their own apps.
3. The platform is becoming multimodal. GPT-4 Turbo with Vision, DALL·E 3, and text-to-speech are all now available to developers.
Oh… and we’re doubling GPT-4 rate limits. https://openai.com/blog/new-models-and-developer-products-announced-at-devday
item.content:encoded:
We're rolling out new features and improvements that developers have been asking for:

1. Our new model GPT-4 Turbo supports 128K context and has fresher knowledge than GPT-4. Its input and output tokens are respectively 3× and 2× less expensive than GPT-4. It’s available now to all developers in preview.

2. Assistants API and new tools (Retrieval, Code Interpreter) will help developers build world-class AI assistants within their own apps.

3. The platform is becoming multimodal. GPT-4 Turbo with Vision, DALL·E 3, and text-to-speech are all now available to developers.

Oh… and we’re doubling GPT-4 rate limits. openai.com/blog/new-models-a…

item.title:
R to @OpenAI: Plus and Enterprise users can start creating GPTs this week at http://chatgpt.com/create.
Later this month, we’ll launch the GPT Store, so people can feature and make money from their GPTs. We plan to offer GPTs to more users soon.
item.content:encoded:
Plus and Enterprise users can start creating GPTs this week at chatgpt.com/create.

Later this month, we’ll launch the GPT Store, so people can feature and make money from their GPTs. We plan to offer GPTs to more users soon.

item.title: GPTs are a new way for anyone to create a tailored version of ChatGPT to be more helpful in their daily life, at specific tasks, at work, or at home — and then share that creation with others. No code required. https://openai.com/blog/introducing-gpts
item.content:encoded: GPTs are a new way for anyone to create a tailored version of ChatGPT to be more helpful in their daily life, at specific tasks, at work, or at home — and then share that creation with others. No code required. openai.com/blog/introducing-…

item.title:
We are building a new Preparedness team to evaluate, forecast, and protect against the risks of highly-capable AI—from today's models to AGI.
Goal: a quantitative, evidence-based methodology, beyond what is accepted as possible: https://openai.com/blog/frontier-risk-and-preparedness
item.content:encoded:
We are building a new Preparedness team to evaluate, forecast, and protect against the risks of highly-capable AI—from today's models to AGI.

Goal: a quantitative, evidence-based methodology, beyond what is accepted as possible: openai.com/blog/frontier-ris…

item.title:
R to @OpenAI: The Frontier Model Forum is an industry body co-founded with @AnthropicAI, @Google and @Microsoft. We will focus on three key areas within AI safety over the next year:
- Identifying best practices - Advancing AI safety research - Facilitating information sharing among companies and governments
Learn more about the FMF: http://frontiermodelforum.org
item.content:encoded:
The Frontier Model Forum is an industry body co-founded with @AnthropicAI, @Google and @Microsoft. We will focus on three key areas within AI safety over the next year:

- Identifying best practices
- Advancing AI safety research
- Facilitating information sharing among companies and governments

Learn more about the FMF: frontiermodelforum.org

item.title: Today, we are announcing Chris Meserole as the Executive Director of the Frontier Model Forum, and the creation of a new AI Safety Fund, a $10 million initiative to promote research in the field of AI safety. https://openai.com/blog/frontier-model-forum-updates
item.content:encoded: Today, we are announcing Chris Meserole as the Executive Director of the Frontier Model Forum, and the creation of a new AI Safety Fund, a $10 million initiative to promote research in the field of AI safety. openai.com/blog/frontier-mod…

item.title: R to @OpenAI: "My business partner and I are creating a coffee shop inspired by our mutual love for rabbits. We have a logo we like a lot that is minimalist with a rabbit, but anxious to get your take on it."
item.content:encoded: "My business partner and I are creating a coffee shop inspired by our mutual love for rabbits. We have a logo we like a lot that is minimalist with a rabbit, but anxious to get your take on it."

item.title: R to @OpenAI: "I am working with a web designer for a new website to sell bicycle helmets. Could you recommend a few website UI's that are both modern and simple that I can share with her as examples?"
item.content:encoded: "I am working with a web designer for a new website to sell bicycle helmets. Could you recommend a few website UI's that are both modern and simple that I can share with her as examples?"

item.title: R to @OpenAI: "I am doing a report on cirrus clouds for my science class. I need photorealistic images that show off how wispy they are. I am going to compare them to photos I took of puffy cumulonimbus clouds at my house yesterday."
item.content:encoded: "I am doing a report on cirrus clouds for my science class. I need photorealistic images that show off how wispy they are. I am going to compare them to photos I took of puffy cumulonimbus clouds at my house yesterday."

item.title: R to @OpenAI: Below are a few sample ways it can be used. Share how you are using the new feature as a reply.
item.content:encoded: Below are a few sample ways it can be used. Share how you are using the new feature as a reply.

item.title:
DALL·E 3 is now available to all ChatGPT Plus & Enterprise users, letting you create unique images through conversation.
Describe your vision, let ChatGPT generate multiple variants, and then request edits — all in real-time. https://openai.com/blog/dall-e-3-is-now-available-in-chatgpt-plus-and-enterprise
item.content:encoded:
DALL·E 3 is now available to all ChatGPT Plus & Enterprise users, letting you create unique images through conversation.

item.title: Interested in pivoting your career into AI/ML research? The OpenAI Residency is designed to help bridge the knowledge gap for exceptional researchers and engineers working in adjacent fields like math, physics, and neuroscience. Accepting applications now: https://openai.com/residency
item.content:encoded: Interested in pivoting your career into AI/ML research? The OpenAI Residency is designed to help bridge the knowledge gap for exceptional researchers and engineers working in adjacent fields like math, physics, and neuroscience. Accepting applications now: openai.com/residency

item.title: R to @OpenAI: Browsing is available to Plus and Enterprise users today, and we’ll expand to all users soon. To enable, choose Browse with Bing in the selector under GPT-4.
item.content:encoded: Browsing is available to Plus and Enterprise users today, and we’ll expand to all users soon. To enable, choose Browse with Bing in the selector under GPT-4.

item.title: R to @OpenAI: Browsing is particularly useful for tasks that require up-to-date information, such as helping you with technical research, trying to choose a bike, or planning a vacation.
item.content:encoded: Browsing is particularly useful for tasks that require up-to-date information, such as helping you with technical research, trying to choose a bike, or planning a vacation.

item.title: R to @OpenAI: Since the original launch of browsing in May, we received useful feedback. Updates include following robots.txt and identifying user agents so sites can control how ChatGPT interacts with them.
item.content:encoded: Since the original launch of browsing in May, we received useful feedback. Updates include following robots.txt and identifying user agents so sites can control how ChatGPT interacts with them.
